content: {"updates": [{"pattern": "this audience", "replacement": "you"}, {"pattern": "The \\*\\*hiring model we’ve followed for decades is dead\\.\\*\\*", "replacement": "The **hiring model we're following is dead.**"}, {"pattern": "The only people who will be relevant in the next 12 months are those who use AI to systemize their expertise—and are willing to accept that\\.", "replacement": "Relevance in the next 12 months depends on using AI to systemize expertise—and accepting that."}, {"pattern": "drop a comment", "replacement": "comment"}, {"pattern": "& DM your email", "replacement": "and DM your email"}]}
